title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 34 - Guidelines For New York State Court Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 34 - Guidelines For New York State Court Facilities

State Regulations
§ 34.0 - Court facilities
§ 34.1 - Maintenance and operation standards for court facilities
§ 34.2 - Reimbursement for cleaning of court facilities
§ 34.3 to 34.7 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 34

Statutory authority: Constitution, art. VI, § 28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
